mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_COMPELTE_HISTORY WHERE seller_id = #{userId} OR buyer_id = #{userId}

SELECT CH.trade_id , CH.trade_item_id , CH.trade_suggest_id , CASE WHEN CH.seller_id = #{userId} THEN CH.buyer_id ELSE CH.seller_id END AS opponent_user_id , U.nickname AS opponent_user_nickname , CASE WHEN CH.seller_id = #{userId} THEN TI.type ELSE TS.type END AS type , TS.purchase_item_id , GI_P.name AS purchase_item_name , TS.purchase_original_price , TS.purchase_discount_yn , TS.purchase_discount_price , TS.exchange_seller_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_item_name , TS.exchange_original_item_id , TS.exchange_suggested_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_suggested_item_name , TS.exchange_change_yn , CH.completed_at AS trade_completed_at FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY CH INNER JOIN TRADE_ITEM TI ON TI.id = CH.trade_item_id INNER JOIN TRADE_SUGGEST TS ON TS.id = CH.trade_suggest_id INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = ( SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN seller_id = #{userId} THEN buyer_id ELSE seller_id FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY ) LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_P ON GI_P.id = TS.purchase_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TS.exchange_seller_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TS.exchange_suggested_item_id WHERE CH.seller_id = #{userId} OR buyer_id = #{userId}
